attributes.action: set up a public inquiry into the performance of Sport England and specifically to examine whether the funds invested by Sport England in the FA is generating satisfactory results.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The senior management of the FA have demonstrated staggering incompetence in recent years and should be held to account for this.  In the first instance there should be an inquiry into their use of public funds (injected via Sport England) and whether the FA is a fit organisation (in its current guise with its current management team) to receive public funding.
